title: Set relations and operations - misc additions

blocks.name: rabss3d
blocks.content: Subclass law for restricted abstraction. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm rabss3d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w1))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wss(crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w1))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  ssrd(s0, crab(s0, c0, w1), crab(s0, c1, w1), w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfrab1(s0, c0, w1)
  nfrab1(s0, c1, w1)
  3imtr4g(w0, wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c0, w1)), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c1, w1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  ex(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1))
  jca(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), w1)
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w1)
  rabid(s0, c0, w1)
  rabid(s0, c1, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rabss3d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 })
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w1))→ s0 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 }), d(s0, c0))
  a1ii((w0 → { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 } ⊆ { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 }), d(s0, c1))
  ssrd(s0, { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 }, w0)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfrab1(s0, c0, w1)
  nfrab1(s0, c1, w1)
  3imtr4g(w0, s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w1 }, s0 ∈ { s0 ∈ c1 | w1 }, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w1), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1))
  ex(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w1), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ w1))
  jca((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w1)), s0 ∈ c1, w1)
  simprr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, w1)
  rabid(s0, c0, w1)
  rabid(s0, c1, w1)
}

blocks.name: inin
blocks.content: Intersection with an intersection. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Dec-2016.)

blocks.name: inindif
difininv
blocks.content: Condition for the intersections of two sets with a given set to be equal. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 28-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm difininv(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls)), wceq(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  eqssd(cin(c0, c2), cin(c1, c2), wa(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls)))
  ssind(cin(c0, c2), c1, c2, wa(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls)))
  adantr(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
  biimpri(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(c0, c2), c1))
  bitr4i(wss(cin(c0, c2), c1), wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cdif(cin(c0, c2), c1), emptycls))
  ssdif0(cin(c0, c2), c1)
  eqeq1i(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls, cdif(cin(c0, c2), c1))
  indif1(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(wa(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls)), wss(cin(c0, c2), c2))
  inss2(c0, c2)
  ssind(cin(c1, c2), c0, c2, wa(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls)))
  adantl(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(c1, c2), c0))
  biimpri(wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls), wss(cin(c1, c2), c0))
  bitr4i(wss(cin(c1, c2), c0), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls), wceq(cdif(cin(c1, c2), c0), emptycls))
  ssdif0(cin(c1, c2), c0)
  eqeq1i(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls, cdif(cin(c1, c2), c0))
  indif1(c1, c0, c2)
  a1i(wa(wceq(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c2), emptycls), wceq(cin(cdif(c1, c0), c2), emptycls)), wss(cin(c1, c2), c2))
  inss2(c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: difeq
blocks.content: Rewriting an equation with class difference, without using quantifiers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 24-Sep-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm difeq(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2), wa(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1))))
} = {
  impbii(wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2), wa(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1))))
  jca(wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1)))
  syl5reqr(cin(c2, c1), emptycls, cin(cdif(c0, c1), c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2))
  eqtr3i(cin(cdif(c0, c1), c1), emptycls, cin(c1, cdif(c0, c1)))
  incom(c1, cdif(c0, c1))
  disjdif(c1, c0)
  ineq1(cdif(c0, c1), c2, c1)
  syl5reqr(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1), cun(cdif(c0, c1), c1), wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2))
  undif1(c0, c1)
  uneq1(cdif(c0, c1), c2, c1)
  mpbid(wa(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1))), wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2), wceq(cdif(c2, c1), c2))
  sylib(wa(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1))), wceq(cdif(c2, c1), c2), wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls))
  simpl(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1)))
  bitri(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cdif(c2, c1), c2), wceq(c2, cdif(c2, c1)))
  disj3(c2, c1)
  eqcom(c2, cdif(c2, c1))
  adantl(wceq(cin(c2, c1), emptycls), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1)), wb(wceq(cdif(c2, c1), c2), wceq(cdif(c0, c1), c2)))
  eqeq1d(cdif(c2, c1), c2, cdif(c0, c1), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1)))
  3eqtr3g(cdif(c2, c1), cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cun(c2, c1), c1), cdif(cun(c0, c1), c1), wceq(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1)))
  difeq1(cun(c2, c1), cun(c0, c1), c1)
  difun2(c2, c1)
  difun2(c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: indifundif
blocks.content: A remarkable equation with sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm indifundif(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cun(cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(c0, c1)), cdif(c0, cin(c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtrri(cun(cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(c0, c1)), cdif(c0, cin(c1, c2)), cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c2)), cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  difindi(c0, c1, c2)
  3eqtr2i(cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c2)), cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2)), cun(cdif(c0, c1), cun(cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))), cun(cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  uneq2i(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c2), cun(cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2)))
  3eqtr3i(cdif(c0, c2), cun(cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2)), cdif(cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1)), c2), cun(cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2)))
  difundir(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1), c2)
  difeq1i(cun(cin(c0, c1), cdif(c0, c1)), c2, c0)
  inundif(c0, c1)
  uncom(cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2))
  unass(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))
  uneq1i(cun(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cdif(c0, c1), c2)), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2), cdif(c0, c1))
  undifabs(cdif(c0, c1), c2)
  uncom(cdif(c0, c1), cdif(cin(c0, c1), c2))
}

blocks.name: elpwincl1
blocks.content: Closure of intersection with regard to elementhood to a power set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2020.)

blocks.name: elpwdifcl
blocks.content: Closure of class difference with regard to elementhood to a power set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2020.)

blocks.name: elpwiuncl
blocks.content: Closure of indexed union with regard to elementhood to a power set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-May-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpwiuncl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cpw(c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  sylibr(w0, wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2), wral(s0, c0, wss(c1, c2)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wss(c1, c2))
  elpwid(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  iunss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  3syl(w0, wb(wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), cpw(c2)), wss(ciun(s0, c0, c1), c2)), wa(wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))), wcel(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, c3), wral(s0, c0, wcel(c1, cpw(c2))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, wcel(c1, cpw(c2)))
  iunexg(s0, c0, c3, c1, cpw(c2))
  elpwg(ciun(s0, c0, c1), universe, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpwiuncl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ P(c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ P(c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ P(c2), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2)
  sylibr(w0, ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ⊆ c2))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ⊆ c2)
  elpwid(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  iunss(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  3syl(w0, (⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ P(c2)↔ ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)⊆ c2), (c0 ∈ c3 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ P(c2))), ⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1)∈ 𝕌)
  jca(w0, c0 ∈ c3, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, c1 ∈ P(c2)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c0, w0, c1 ∈ P(c2))
  iunexg(s0, c0, c3, c1, P(c2))
  elpwg(⋃(s0 ∈ c0, c1), universe, c2)
}
